name: Sherwin-Williams
description: A vibrant facade of color, promising to cover up the cracks of reality. The Sherwin-Williams paint store is a deceptive oasis of color in a world of fading hues. Walls are lined with endless swatches, each promising a fresh start, a brighter future, or at least a decent coat of "Harvest Gold" to hide the peeling wallpaper. The air is thick with the chemical tang of paint and the faint, hopeful scent of renovation. A bored clerk leans against the counter, waiting for someone to believe that a new shade of "Seafoam Green" can truly change anything.
